ORDER
Dated this the 8th day of January 2021
This Crl.M.C. is filed to quash Annexure Al
F.I.R. in Crime No.259 of 2014 of Sholayar Police
Station, Palakkad. This Crl.M.C. is pending before
this Court from 2015 onwards. There is no stay order
also. Therefore, there is no purpose in keeping this
Cr1.M.C. pending before this Court. After
investigation of the case, if a final report is
filed, the petitioners are free to challenge the same
in appropriate proceedings.
With the above liberty, this Crl1.M.c. is
dismissed.
Sd/-
P.V.KUNHIKRISHNAN
